title: Sonar sensor cone has a collision

content.raw:
Hello!

I want to place a sonar sensor on a box and looking for objects on scene by moving that box. 
But sonar cone doesn't intersects with objects, but collides with them. This looks as sonar cone has a collision.
I attached some screenshots and example world.

Maybe someone knows how can I solve this? Thanks!
content.html:
Hello!

I want to place a sonar sensor on a box and looking for objects on scene by moving that box. But sonar cone doesn't intersects with objects, but collides with them. This looks as sonar cone has a collision. I attached some screenshots and example world.
